articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: 'When he will bat...': Pathan warns Australia of 'completely different' Kohli - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Irfan Pathan has a warning for Australia ahead of WTC final against India: Don't confuse this version of Kohli to the one two years ago. | Cricket
articles.content: The century-drought is long over and the flow of runs is back. Virat Kohli is back batting at his best, and come the World Test Championship final starting Wednesday, former India all-rounder Irfan P… [+2375 chars]
